<title level="1" right="Action">[Boar Charge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2277) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 208 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

The boar Strides twice in a straight line and then makes a tusk Strike. As long as it moved at least 20 feet, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack roll.
name: Boar Charge
